And your disregard of health reform is unfitting you to stand as the Lord's messenger. Indulgence in meat-eating, and tea-drinking, and other forms of self-pleasing, is injurious to the health of the body and the soul. --Letter 23, 1896, p. 3. (To a minister, December 14, 1896.) 

Released June 29, 1976.
